seriesJson.title: The music of Don Gillis
seriesJson.description: This series features the works of Don Gillis; hosted by the composer himself. Most of the performances are conducted by the composer.

node.title: The composer's favorites
node.description: Don Gillis plays his own favorite compositions and explains why.

node.title: Music for concert band
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for concert band.

node.title: Works with soloists
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions that feature soloists.

node.title: Symphony No. 5 and more
node.description: National High School Band of Interlochen performs the first and final movements of Don Gillis' Symphony No. 5, as well as A Short Overture to an Unwritten Opera and a soliloquy for strings.

node.title: Three symphonic movements
node.description: This program features three slow symphonic movements composed by Don Gillis.

node.title: Christmas special, part one
node.description: Christmas Special #1. The Night Before Christmas; The Coming of the King.

node.title: Music for narrator and orchestra
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for narrator and orchestra.

node.title: Music for marching band
node.description: Music for Marching Band. The Mighty Mac, by National High School Band of Interlochen; Ballet for Band by University of Illinois Band; Minuetcera by United States Army Band.

node.title: The libretto, Part 2
node.description: The Libretto, Part 2. Conclusion of previous program.

node.title: The libretto, Part 1
node.description: The Libretto, Part 1. An opera about a composer who needs a libretto to write an opera about.

node.title: Thomas Wolfe, American
node.description: This performance of Thomas Wolfe, American features Dr. James Pfohl and the Transylvania Symphony Orchestra. Also featured is a performance of Paul Bunyan: Overture to a Legend.

node.title: Lone Star: A Rhapsody for Band and  Suite: Saga of a Pioneer
node.description: This program features performances of Loine Star: A Rhapsody for Band  and  Suite: Saga of a Pioneer.  Includes discussion on writing for band. Music played by University Band of Interlochen and University of Illinois Band.

node.title: Shindig
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' composition, Shindig.

node.title: Additional selections
node.description: This program features a varied selection of Don Gillis' compositions.

node.title: Various selections
node.description: This program features a varied selection of Don Gillis' compositions.

node.title: Works for chorus and soloists
node.description: This program features several works by Don Gillis for choral groups and soloists.

node.title: Pops potpourri
node.description: This program focuses on six short compositions by Don Gillis.

node.title: Two compositions for band
node.description: This program focuses on a pair of Don Gillis' compositions for band.

node.title: Peachstreet Promenade and more
node.description: This program focuses on some of composer Don Gillis' favorite compositions, including Peachtree Promenade.

node.title: Inspiration of jazz
node.description: This program focuses on the influence of jazz on the compositions of Don Gillis.

node.title: Symphony No. 7
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' Symphony No. 7.

node.title: The Land of Wheat
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gilis' composition, The Land of Wheat.

node.title: The Alamo and Tulsa
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions The Alamo and Tulsa.

node.title: Compositions for bands
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for bands.

node.title: Ranch House Party and more
node.description: This program features performances of Don Gillis' work "Ranch House Party" and more.

node.title: Symphony 5 1/2, a Symphony for Fun and more
node.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis', "Symphony 5 1/2," as well as some of his other compositions.
